title: Deploy a new build (no functional changes)

requirements.text: Deploy a new build of the current application state so the latest changes are live/previewable.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment/build is produced from the current codebase state without requiring additional feature changes.
The newly deployed version is accessible via the standard preview/live URL used by the platform.

requirements.text: After deployment, verify that the AMC tab is visible for authenticated users and that currency amounts display with the ₹ symbol consistently across the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in, the Dashboard shows an "AMC" tab and the AMC screen renders without errors.
UI-rendered money amounts use ₹ formatting consistently (including dashboards and analytics views).

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify any files under frontend/immutablePaths (compose UI components instead).
Respect the single-actor backend architecture (all Motoko logic remains in backend/main.mo).
nonGoals: Adding new AMC functionality beyond what is already implemented.
Changing application features or UI behavior unrelated to deployment verification.
